ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Maestro doesn t dispel, so I don t think Verses is the proper song - you should have the enchanters/shaman speed buff everyone ahead of time.  Against
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Benjamin Jerrad Segal wrote:
>
> [Maestro]
>
> I haven't kept track of how much the tap is taking per cast, but with
> resistances I've never saved completely outright. My tactic over this
> weekend for the two fights we had against him were to weave verses and
> niv's, I had trouble adding a third with the number of people there.

The Maestro doesn't dispel, so I don't think Verses is the
proper song - you should have the enchanters/shaman speed buff
everyone ahead of time. Against mobs that do dispel and where
time is critical (Innoruk/Cazic, and to a lesser extent the
dragons), I'm still undecided as to which is better - healing,
resists, or attack speedups.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
